title: Verify: Implement If/Else Node for Conditional Routing
description:
Run automated tests for task T-060.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Implement If/Else Node to evaluate a condition (contains, equals, regex, JSON path) and route to one of two output branches.
Criteria:
- If/Else Node supports all listed conditions
- Correct branch is taken based on input
- Visual indication of branch taken
acceptance_criteria: If/Else Node supports all listed conditions
Correct branch is taken based on input
